turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to find out where my package is. The tracking hasn't updated in days and it was supposed to be delivered yesterday.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I am happy to help. Can I get your tracking number please?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I'm looking up the tracking information now... Okay, it seems the package is currently in transit and was last scanned at a distribution center two days ago. Unfortunately, it is delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. We are working to get it to you as soon as possible. I apologize for any inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? Seriously? What does that even mean? And when can I expect it? I really needed this by yesterday!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, the exact reason for the delay is not specified in the tracking details. Based on the current information, I estimate it will be delivered within 3 business days, but I don't have a guaranteed delivery date. I can set up email alerts to keep you informed.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: So you're telling me you don't know why it's delayed, or when it's coming? This is incredibly unhelpful. What kind of customer service is this? Can you at least give me a discount code for my next purchase?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am truly sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. While I cannot provide a discount code directly, I can escalate your case to a supervisor to explore options for compensation. Would you like me to do that?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. Thank you for offering to do that.
